properties.description: Profisee members get REST API call.

relativeUrl.value:
@concat('members/',
dataset().entityId, 
'/?pageSize=', string(dataset().pageSize),
'&attributes=', dataset().attributes,
'&filter=', dataset().filter,
'&orderBy=', dataset().orderBy,
'&dbaFormat=', string(dataset().dbaFormat)
)
